rooms.description: A spacious entrance that adheres to Vastu principles ensuring a welcoming energy with minimal clutter and proper lighting.
An open, airy living space reflecting Bohemian style with eclectic decor and natural light. A blend of traditional Indian aesthetics with modern art forms.
A versatile dining area designed to accommodate family gatherings while ensuring a harmonious flow between dining and living spaces.
A functional kitchen with modern amenities integrated into a Bohemian design that promotes ease of movement. Incorporates local building norms for ventilation.
An integrated service area for utilities and storage, ensuring efficient space utilization without compromising aesthetics.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned according to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Large windows in the living room allow ample natural light and enhance ventilation.
Balcony access to provide outdoor connectivity and a serene view of the swimming pool area.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with integrated closet and a private balcony ensuring privacy and adherence to Vastu for prosperity.
The second bedroom designed with ample storage space and aesthetic Bohemian elements to create a relaxing environment.
A comfortable third bedroom for children or guests, keeping Vastu principles in mind with appropriate orientation and space flow.
A well-ventilated bathroom designed for utility and safety, incorporating local norms and aesthetic elements.

openings.description: A staircase designed for seamless connectivity between floors with safety and Vastu-aligned orientation.
Private balcony attached to the master bedroom offering an outdoor retreat aligned with Bohemian aesthetics.
A designated area for a swimming pool ensuring ample space and safety features while aligning with the Bohemian design aesthetic.
